name: Latest Posts
author: ShapedPlugin LLC

sections.description:
Latest Posts is a very powerful widget plugin for WordPress which displays your most recent or latest posts, category based with thumbnails, date. This is perfect for simple blogs & online magazines. Widgets come with highly-customizable control panels. Easy to use and support multi-widget even in the same sidebar.

Features:

  • 100% Responsive & Mobile Ready
  • Super Easy Installation
  • Minimalist & Lightweight
  • Easily Customizable
  • All Major Browsers Supported
  • Coded with Pure HTML & CSS
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload it to the plugins folder of your blog.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Now, goto the Widgets page of the Appearance section and configure the Latest Posts.
sections.changelog:
1.4.4 Jan 25, 2024

  • Tested: WordPress 6.4.2 compatibility.

1.4.3 May 25, 2023

  • New: A hook ‘sp_lpw_date_format’ to modify the date format of posts.
  • Fix: The undefined variable warnings.
  • Tested: WordPress 6.2 compatibility.

1.4.2 May 28, 2022

  • Tested: WordPress 6.0 compatibility.

1.4.1 Mar 16, 2021

  • Tested: WordPress 5.7 compatibility.

1.4

  • Fixed deprecated constructor

1.3

  • Category select option fixed

1.2

  • WP_Widget Error fixed

1.1

  • Add class in time and date.
  • Remove . in title.

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Latest posts widget to display recent posts from category.
